We're happy to know that our product 0% APR InstaCash and other services were able to help you! It’s members like you that help make MoneyLion ROAR! Given you’ve expressed a positive experience with MoneyLion, would you be open to also sharing this review on other review sites, including Google Play, Apple Store, BBB, and Wallethub. Additionally, Credit Builder Plus is a powerful membership that helps you build your credit over time to meet your long-term goals with a credit builder loan up to $1,000. There's no credit check to apply.  You simply link your bank account, and we'll securely look for a few factors like income and healthy financial habits to qualify you. With Credit Builder Plus membership, you'll get a Credit Builder Loan that qualifies you for up to $1,000 based on your linked account. Some of the funding you'll receive right away, and some we'll save for you in a Credit Reserve Account in your name to help you save while you build credit. You'll get access to those funds to spend on whatever you want about 10 business days after you pay your loan in full. Credit building and reporting – We report your loan payments to all three credit bureaus to help you build credit, and you'll get weekly credit score updates in the app track your progress. 0% APR Instacash advances up to $250 per pay period any time day or night, and Monthly Lion’s Share Loyalty Program payouts up to $19.99. All of these benefits for $19.99/month (plus your loan & membership payments). Thanks again for being the best part of MoneyLion!

text:
Great service.   It’s a real help.  Easy to use and understand.  Saved my bacon a few times when I really needed a little extra cash.  

Only complaint is that you have to have direct deposit or keep a balance. If not they will try to take the fees out of your bank account at 2 am Friday morning.  Make sure to have funds available.  Direct deposit is not an option for me, so I have had insufficient funds fees and MoneyLion customer support won’t let me change the day my fees are withdrawn
title: Great service
